org.apache.archiva.components.registry.commons

Class CommonsConfigurationRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.archiva.components.registry.commons.CommonsConfigurationRegistry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Registry

    @Service(value="commons-configuration")
public class CommonsConfigurationRegistry
extends Object
implements Registry
    Implementation of the registry component using Commons Configuration. The use of Commons Configuration enables a variety of sources to be used, including XML files, properties, JNDI, JDBC, etc.

    The component can be configured using the properties configuration item, the content of which should take the format of an input to the Commons Configuration configuration builder.

      • addChangeListener

        public void addChangeListener(RegistryListener listener)
        Description copied from interface: Registry
        Add a change listener. Note that settings this on the base registry will only detect 'invalidation' events, not individual changes. You should retrieve the named sub-registry to listen for changes. TODO: this isn't ideal, so maybe fix combined configuration to re-fire it's events to it's own listeners in the c-c implementation
        Specified by:
        addChangeListener in interface Registry
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener
